org.apache.hadoop.hbase

Class HBaseServerException

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.lang.Throwable
      • java.lang.Exception
        • java.io.IOException
          • org.apache.hadoop.hbase.HBaseIOException
            • org.apache.hadoop.hbase.HBaseServerException
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Serializable
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    CallDroppedException

    @InterfaceAudience.Public
public class HBaseServerException
extends HBaseIOException
    Base class for exceptions thrown by an HBase server. May contain extra info about the state of the server when the exception was thrown.
    See Also:
    Serialized Form
